summary.placeholder: A brief professional summary highlighting your key qualifications and career objectives...

list.title: Job Vacancies
list.emptyDescription: Add your first job vacancy to start tailoring resumes

form.title: Vacancy Details
form.companyHint: Required. The company offering the position.
form.jobPositionHint: Optional. Leave blank if not specified.
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Paste the full job description here...
form.descriptionHint: Required. Include requirements, responsibilities, and qualifications.
form.urlHint: Optional. Link to the job posting.
form.notesPlaceholder: Add any personal notes about this vacancy...
form.notesHint: Optional. Private notes for your reference.

detail.title: Vacancy Details
detail.generateHint: Generate a tailored resume optimized for this vacancy. The AI will analyze the job description and emphasize your most relevant skills and experience.

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this vacancy?
delete.description: This action cannot be undone. All associated tailored resumes will also be deleted.

delete.description: This will mark the user as deleted. You can’t undo this action.

controls.description: Toggle platform access and default provider settings.

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: System-wide usage across parse, generate, and export operations.

footer.tagline: Tailor your resume for every opportunity

hero.headline: Tailor your resume to every vacancy — fast.
hero.subheadline: Upload a DOCX or PDF, review the structured result, generate ATS + human-friendly versions, and export clean PDFs.
hero.disclaimer: Free tier available. Bring your own API key if you want higher limits.

upload.title: Upload
upload.description: Upload your resume in DOCX or PDF format

review.title: Review
review.description: Review parsed JSON and fix any missing fields

vacancy.title: Add Vacancy
vacancy.description: Add company, position, and job description

export.title: Generate & Export
export.description: Generate tailored resumes and export ATS/Human PDFs

comparison.title: ATS vs Human Resume
comparison.subtitle: ApplyKit keeps the content consistent between both versions — only the presentation changes.

human.title: Human Resume
human.point3: Best when recruiter asks for a "nice PDF"

apiKey.question: Is it safe to paste my API key?
apiKey.answer: You can use the free tier, or bring your own key. Keys are treated as sensitive. Prefer temporary keys.

atsPlain.question: Why does my ATS resume look plain?
atsPlain.answer: That's intentional: ATS parsers prefer predictable structure.

editing.question: Can I edit the result?
editing.answer: Yes — MVP uses a JSON editor. A friendly UI editor comes later.

formats.question: DOCX or PDF?
formats.answer: DOCX is preferred, but PDF parsing is supported too.
